name: Escape Through The Cave Pit - Tapping Challenge
name_original: Escape Through The Cave Pit - Tapping Challenge
description:
How long can you survive in this arcade gameplay where you need to test your reaction skills and move higher and higher avoiding the spikey obstacles. The Cave Pit is filled with voids and spikes objects that can damage you and leads to game over.

It’s a great challenging gameplay where you need to tap on and on to survive throughout the endless route.

How higher can you reach?

Can you beat the high scores on leaderboard?
